title: Aveda  Be Curly Enhancer, 6.7-Ounce Tube
description: For intensifying curls, taming frizz and heightening shine. Wheat protein blend expands when hair is wet - then retracts when hair is dry - to lock in curls or waves.

title: Belson Pro Universal Tourmaline Ceramic Dual Diffuser
description:
Universal Tourmaline/Ceramic Dual Diffuser

 Fits most Hair Dryers Tourmaline Infused Two Styling Surfaces: Flat and Volume Fingers

title: L'Oreal Paris EverStrong Sulfate-Free Fortify System Reconstruct Conditioner, 8.5 Fluid Ounce
description: Introducing formulas so gentle, yet so strengthening. Free of harsh sulfates, the EverStrong Sulfate-Free Fortify System contains our patented bio-ceramide complex, which strengthens the hair fiber after just one use, helping it resist breakage. A rich lather and natural aromatic properties from rosemary and mint help energize and invigorate the senses.
